noun.name: horse
noun.discription: a large, strong animal with four legs, commonly used for riding or pulling vehicles

object1.name: zebra
object1.discription: in parallel with 'horse', is a large, wild animal with black and white stripes, native to Africa

object2.name: donkey
object2.discription: in parallel with 'horse', is a smaller, sturdy animal often used as a pack or work animal

object3.name: unicorn
object3.discription: in parallel with 'horse', is a mythical creature with a single, spiraling horn on its forehead

object4.name: camel
object4.discription: in parallel with 'horse', is a large, humped animal adapted to life in desert environments

object5.name: rhinoceros
object5.discription: in parallel with 'horse', is a large, thick-skinned animal with one or two horns on its nose

object6.name: elephant
object6.discription: in parallel with 'horse', is a massive, long-nosed animal with large ears and tusks

object7.name: giraffe
object7.discription: in parallel with 'horse', is a tall, long-necked animal with distinctive spotted patterns

object8.name: kangaroo
object8.discription: in parallel with 'horse', is a large, hopping marsupial native to Australia
